BundleInfo.name: ChimeraX-AMESViewer
BundleInfo.Author: AMES Developer
BundleInfo.Synopsis: Evolutionary trajectory viewer for AMES simulations
BundleInfo.Description: A tool for visualizing molecular evolution trajectories from AMES (Atomistic Molecular Evolution Simulator). Unlike traditional MD trajectories, AMES trajectories contain structures with varying numbers of atoms and residues. This tool sequentially aligns structures using ChimeraX's matchmaker and provides playback controls for visualization.

Classifiers.ChimeraXClassifier: ChimeraX :: Tool :: AMES Viewer :: General :: Visualize evolutionary trajectories from AMES simulations
